name: ChangeDataDirectory
author: Pranav Purwar
description: Changes the directory where the IDE stores the data including projects, plugins, etc. to external storage.

name: CosmicDarkTheme
author: Cosmic IDE Team
description: A dark theme for the Cosmic IDE, with a focus on high contrast and readability.

name: MaterialIconsPack
author: Google Inc.
description: A comprehensive icon pack based on Google Material Icons for file tree view.
